text: Hi <@U02ST0J24UD> are you adding the SPF record as a new TXT record, or are you editing an existing one? I found that if the suggestion in HubSpot says "typo" or missing record, and it tells you what the current data is, you need to edit that data and not create a new one. That is when it actually works and it propagates almost instantly. Let me know if that makes sense and it is what you were asking
